name: Puppet Kings
description: Puppet Kings is a modern take on the Breakout genre taking block-breaking to new levels of fun by introducing characters, boss rush as primary game mode and a roguelike twist.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
